content: 1 Paul and Silvanus and Timothy— Unto the assembly of Thessalonians､ in God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ,—
content_old: 1 Paul and Silvanus and Timothy— Unto the assembly of Thessalonians､ in God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ,—

content: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, from God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, from God our Father and Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 3 We are bound to be giving thanks unto God､ continually､ concerning you, brethren, even as it is meet; Because your faith groweth exceedingly､ And the love of each one of you all one to another aboundeth,
content_old: 3 We are bound to be giving thanks unto God､ continually､ concerning you, brethren, even as it is meet; Because your faith groweth exceedingly､ And the love of each one of you all one to another aboundeth,

content: 4 So that we ourselves in you are boasting､ in the assemblies of God､ Over your endurance and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations which ye are sustaining:—
content_old: 4 So that we ourselves in you are boasting､ in the assemblies of God､ Over your endurance and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations which ye are sustaining:—

content: 5 A proof of the righteous judgment of God, To the end ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God､ in behalf of which ye are also suffering:—
content_old: 5 A proof of the righteous judgment of God, To the end ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God､ in behalf of which ye are also suffering:—

content: 6 If､ at least､ it is a righteous thing with God To recompense affliction unto them that afflict you､
content_old: 6 If､ at least､ it is a righteous thing with God To recompense affliction unto them that afflict you､

content: 7 And unto you that are afflicted release､ with us,— By the revealing of the Lord Jesus from heaven､ With his messengers of power､
content_old: 7 And unto you that are afflicted release､ with us,— By the revealing of the Lord Jesus from heaven､ With his messengers of power､

content: 8 In a fiery flame; Holding forth vengeance— Against them that refuse to know God､ And them who decline to hearken unto the glad-message of our Lord Jesus,—
content_old: 8 In a fiery flame; Holding forth vengeance— Against them that refuse to know God､ And them who decline to hearken unto the glad-message of our Lord Jesus,—

content: 9 Who､ indeed､ a penalty shall pay— Age-abiding destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might—
content_old: 9 Who､ indeed､ a penalty shall pay— Age-abiding destruction from the face of the Lord and from the glory of his might—

content: 10 Whensoever he shall come､ To be made all-glorious in his saints, And to be marvelled at in all who believed,— Because our witness unto you was believed,— In that day.
content_old: 10 Whensoever he shall come､ To be made all-glorious in his saints, And to be marvelled at in all who believed,— Because our witness unto you was believed,— In that day.

content: 11 Unto which end we are also praying continually for you, That our God may count you worthy of your calling､ And fulfil every good-pleasure of goodness and work of faith with power,—
content_old: 11 Unto which end we are also praying continually for you, That our God may count you worthy of your calling､ And fulfil every good-pleasure of goodness and work of faith with power,—

content: 1 But we request you､ brethren,— In behalf of the Presence of our Lord Jesus Christ､ And our gathering together unto him,—
content_old: 1 But we request you､ brethren,— In behalf of the Presence of our Lord Jesus Christ､ And our gathering together unto him,—

content: 2 That ye be not quickly tossed from your mind､ nor be put in alarm— Either by spirit､ or by discourse､ or by letter as by us,— As that the day of the Lord hath set in:
content_old: 2 That ye be not quickly tossed from your mind､ nor be put in alarm— Either by spirit､ or by discourse､ or by letter as by us,— As that the day of the Lord hath set in:

content: 3 That no one may cheat you in any one respect. Because that day will not set in— Except the revolt come first､ And there be revealed The man of lawlessness, The son of destruction,
content_old: 3 That no one may cheat you in any one respect. Because that day will not set in— Except the revolt come first､ And there be revealed The man of lawlessness, The son of destruction,

content: 4 The one who opposeth and exalteth himself on high Against every one called God､ Or an object of worship; So that he within the sanctuary of God shall take his seat Showeth himself forth､ that he is God:—
content_old: 4 The one who opposeth and exalteth himself on high Against every one called God､ Or an object of worship; So that he within the sanctuary of God shall take his seat Showeth himself forth､ that he is God:—

content: 5 Remember ye not､ that while I was yet with you these very things I was telling you?
content_old: 5 Remember ye not､ that while I was yet with you these very things I was telling you?

content: 6 And what now restraineth ye know, To the end he may be revealed in his own fitting time;
content_old: 6 And what now restraineth ye know, To the end he may be revealed in his own fitting time;

content: 7 For the secret of lawlessness already is inwardly working itself,— Only until he that restraineth at present shall be gone out of the midst:
content_old: 7 For the secret of lawlessness already is inwardly working itself,— Only until he that restraineth at present shall be gone out of the midst:

content: 8 And then shall be revealed the lawless one,— Whom the Lord Jesus will slay with the Spirit of his mouth, And paralyse with the forthshining of his Presence:—
content_old: 8 And then shall be revealed the lawless one,— Whom the Lord Jesus will slay with the Spirit of his mouth, And paralyse with the forthshining of his Presence:—

content: 9 Whose presence shall be according to an inworking of Satan､ With all manner of mighty work and signs and wonders of falsehood,
content_old: 9 Whose presence shall be according to an inworking of Satan､ With all manner of mighty work and signs and wonders of falsehood,

content: 10 And with all manner of deceit of unrighteousness in them who are destroying themselves, Because the love of the truth they did not welcome､ that they might be saved;—
content_old: 10 And with all manner of deceit of unrighteousness in them who are destroying themselves, Because the love of the truth they did not welcome､ that they might be saved;—

content: 11 And for this cause God sendeth them an inworking of error, To the end they should believe in the falsehood,—
content_old: 11 And for this cause God sendeth them an inworking of error, To the end they should believe in the falsehood,—

content: 12 In order that all should be judged Who would not believe in the truth､ But were well-pleased with the unrighteousness.
content_old: 12 In order that all should be judged Who would not believe in the truth､ But were well-pleased with the unrighteousness.

content: 13 But we are bound to give thanks unto God continually concerning you､ Brethren beloved by the Lord, For that God chose you､ from the beginning､ Unto salvation, In sanctification of spirit and belief of truth,—
content_old: 13 But we are bound to give thanks unto God continually concerning you､ Brethren beloved by the Lord, For that God chose you､ from the beginning､ Unto salvation, In sanctification of spirit and belief of truth,—

content: 14 Unto which he called you､ through means of our glad-message, Unto an acquiring of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 14 Unto which he called you､ through means of our glad-message, Unto an acquiring of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 15 Hence､ then､ brethren, stand firm､ and hold fast the instructions—which ye were taught—whether through discourse､ or through our letter.
content_old: 15 Hence､ then､ brethren, stand firm､ and hold fast the instructions—which ye were taught—whether through discourse､ or through our letter.

content: 16 But may our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and our God and Father,— Who hath loved you､ and given you Age-abiding consolation and good hope by favour
content_old: 16 But may our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and our God and Father,— Who hath loved you､ and given you Age-abiding consolation and good hope by favour

content: 1 For the rest brethren, be praying for us,— That the word of the Lord may be running､ and gaining glory, According as it did even with you;
content_old: 1 For the rest brethren, be praying for us,— That the word of the Lord may be running､ and gaining glory, According as it did even with you;

content: 2 And that we may be rescued from the presuming and wicked men; For not all hold the faith.
content_old: 2 And that we may be rescued from the presuming and wicked men; For not all hold the faith.

content: 3 Faithful is the Lord,—who will confirm you､ and guard you from the wicked one:
content_old: 3 Faithful is the Lord,—who will confirm you､ and guard you from the wicked one:

content: 4 We are persuaded､ however､ in the Lord, as touching you,— That what things we give in charge Ye both are doing and will do;—
content_old: 4 We are persuaded､ however､ in the Lord, as touching you,— That what things we give in charge Ye both are doing and will do;—

content: 5 But may the Lord guide your hearts Into the love of God, And into the endurance of the Christ.
content_old: 5 But may the Lord guide your hearts Into the love of God, And into the endurance of the Christ.

content: 6 Howbeit､ we charge you､ brethren,— That in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ ye be withdrawing yourselves from every brother— Who in a disorderly way doth walk, And not according to the instruction which ye received from us.
content_old: 6 Howbeit､ we charge you､ brethren,— That in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ ye be withdrawing yourselves from every brother— Who in a disorderly way doth walk, And not according to the instruction which ye received from us.

content: 7 For ye yourselves know､ how needful it is to be imitating us, In that we were not disorderly among you､
content_old: 7 For ye yourselves know､ how needful it is to be imitating us, In that we were not disorderly among you､

content: 8 Nor as a free-gift did eat bread from anyone, But with toil and hardship､ night and day working,— That we might not burden any of you;—
content_old: 8 Nor as a free-gift did eat bread from anyone, But with toil and hardship､ night and day working,— That we might not burden any of you;—

content: 9 Not because we have not authority, But that ourselves､ as an ensample we might hold forth unto you,— To the end ye might be imitating us.
content_old: 9 Not because we have not authority, But that ourselves､ as an ensample we might hold forth unto you,— To the end ye might be imitating us.

content: 10 For even when we were with you this were we giving in charge unto you,— That if any will not work neither let him eat!
content_old: 10 For even when we were with you this were we giving in charge unto you,— That if any will not work neither let him eat!

content: 11 We hear､ in fact､ of some who are walking among you in a disorderly way, At nothing working､ yet too busily working!
content_old: 11 We hear､ in fact､ of some who are walking among you in a disorderly way, At nothing working､ yet too busily working!

content: 12 Now such as these we charge and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ,— That with quietness working Their own bread they be eating.
content_old: 12 Now such as these we charge and exhort in the Lord Jesus Christ,— That with quietness working Their own bread they be eating.

content: 13 But ye brethren, Be not weary in well-doing;—
content_old: 13 But ye brethren, Be not weary in well-doing;—

content: 14 And if anyone be not giving ear unto our word through means of this letter On this one set a mark— Not to be mixing yourselves up with him,— That he may be reproved;
content_old: 14 And if anyone be not giving ear unto our word through means of this letter On this one set a mark— Not to be mixing yourselves up with him,— That he may be reproved;

content: 15 And not as an enemy be esteeming him, But be admonishing him as a brother.
content_old: 15 And not as an enemy be esteeming him, But be admonishing him as a brother.

content: 16 But may the Lord of peace himself give you peace､ Always､ in every way. TheLord be with you all.
content_old: 16 But may the Lord of peace himself give you peace､ Always､ in every way. TheLord be with you all.

content: 17 The salutation of Paul—with my own hand, Which is a sign in every letter: Thus I write.
content_old: 17 The salutation of Paul—with my own hand, Which is a sign in every letter: Thus I write.
